Articles.Content:
I'm getting frame rate problems in 2.0

Is anyone else?

Its never happened before and I have the same settings.
I don't think anyone ill have problems with a version 2.0...As it doesn't exist, 0.20 being the current version.

I'm getting frame rate problems in 2.0

Is anyone else?

Its never happened before and I have the same settings.

it seems to be a case by case thing, most people stayed the same or improved while some got worse. perhaps yor computer just hates the update.
The usual questions.. Have you made sure you're using latest drivers? Tried a clean KSP install to make sure it's not because of an incompatible mod? etc.

Hey AceGamer

I'd suggest taking a look at the support forum. [thread=24543]This thread[/thread] gives a pretty good run down of the info (logs etc) that is usually helpful in diagnosing issues.

Closing this thread.
